name: A Vampire Through Time
description: A Vampire Through Time is a simple platformer where you must manipulate the stage using a time machine to transition between two different versions of the stage and use a version of your past self to solve puzzles. These initial levels will test the players foresight and ability to plan their present movement to help them solve the level, sometimes with the help of their past self. Press E to press buttons, go through time machines, and pick up boxes. Press R to restart a level, press W to jump, and get to the brown door to get through a level. Some levels include time traveling from anywhere in the map using F. Have fun!
